name: shortfuts
description: Exposes keyboard shortcuts for FIFA Ultimate Team (FUT) web app.

command0.description: Toggles the extension on and off

command1.description: Pulls in FUTBIN data for the current item

command2.description: Stores current item in the club

command3.description: Buys the current item for BIN price

command4.description: Compares price of the current item with other items on the market

command6.description: Sends current item to transfer list

command7.description: Lists the current item for minimum BIN

command8.description: Lists the current item (with currently selected price range)

command10.description: Quick sells all remaining items in pack

command11.description: Stores all remaining items in pack in the club

command12.description: Toggles current item's status on your transfer targets list

command13.description: Makes a bid on the current item
